com.totalcross.knowcode.parse

Class NodeSax

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.totalcross.knowcode.parse.NodeSax

  • public class NodeSax
extends java.lang.Object
    NodeSax access the nodes and attributes of the XML file. Each method reads a specific tag and return its value.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Creates a NodeSax object

      • getRelativeX

        public int getRelativeX()
                 throws totalcross.sys.InvalidNumberException
        Get the relative positioning of x axis. Checks the following tags: "android:layout_alignParentLeft" "app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf" "app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf" "app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf" "app:layout_constraintLeft_toRightOf" "app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf" "app:layout_constraintRight_toRightOf" "app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf" "android:layout_alignParentRight" "android:layout_alignParentEnd" "android:layout_alignParentStart" "android:layout_toEndOf" "android:layout_alignRight" "android:layout_alignLeft" "android:layout_alignEnd" "android:layout_toLeftof" "android:layout_toRightOf" "android:layout_toStartOf" "android:layout_centerInParent" "android:layout_centerHorizontal" "android:layout_editor_absoluteX"
        Returns:
        totalcross positioning constant
        Throws:
        totalcross.sys.InvalidNumberException

      • getRelativeY

        public int getRelativeY()
                 throws totalcross.sys.InvalidNumberException
        Get the relative positioning of y axis. Checks the following tags: "app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf" "app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf" "app:constraintBottom_toTopOf" "app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf" "app:layout_constraintBaseline_toBaselineOf" "app:layout_constraintRight_toRightOf" "android:layout_alignBaseline" "android:layout_alignTop" "android:layout_alignBottom" "android:layout_below" "android:layout_above" "android:layout_alignParentTop" "android:layout_alignParentBottom" "android:layout_centerVertical" "android:layout_toRightOf" "android:layout_toStartOf" "android:layout_centerInParent" "tools:layout_editor_absoluteY"
        Returns:
        totalcross positioning constant
        Throws:
        totalcross.sys.InvalidNumberException
